alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 6:58PM EDT until September 02 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marquette County in north central Upper Michigan... Northeastern Baraga County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Keweenaw Bay to near L`anse, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Skanee around 710 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include The Huron Islands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
